name: Into the Web (Browser)
description:
THE PLOT

It is the era of the Internet, computers, and technologies, but something evil is lurking underneath the surface. Humanity is doomed, and soon, there will be no human at all. You are hired by an underground organization to go into the web and to hack the way out. What you do will save all of humanity. But they are always watching...

PLAY IN BROWSER!

Playing games should be enjoyable and easy, but there're some limitations from the game engine and specs required. As a result:

+ Use Firefox (recommended) or Google Chrome. It won't work in Safari and Edge unfortunately.

+ If the game won't launch, reload the page and launch it again.

WANNA KOWN MORE?

Check out its original itch.io page
